titles.title: A resolution to constitute the majority party's membership on certain committees for the One Hundred Sixteenth Congress, or until their successors are chosen.
A resolution to constitute the majority party's membership on certain committees for the One Hundred Sixteenth Congress, or until their successors are chosen.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry
Senate Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: This resolution designates the majority party's membership on specified Senate committees for the 116th Congress.
